title: [lettering] Cheesy Font
content:
Is there a typeface on the line of Bello eventually, closer to this lettering ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/ricotta_3420.gif)
author: Alessandro Segalini

comments.content:
Alessandro, I think your sample is hand-lettered. Identical letters are shaped a bit differently.

[Challenge](http://web.archive.org/web/20070315103959/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/challenge/) is somewhat similar, I would say.  
- Mike Yanega
Yes, it is hand-lettered——your suggestions are helpful, thank you.

Check out Hubert Jochem’s Branding Typefaces:

[http://www.hubertjocham.de/item.php/type/packaging/Flavour/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070315103959/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/item.php/type/packaging/Flavour/)

(There is a pop-up where you’ll find the other styles).
